issue.title: Tunnel qualification how to, and deadline

content.raw:
Yes there are updates:

1. [https://community.subtchallenge.com/t/urban-circuit-qualification-deadlines/1109](https://community.subtchallenge.com/t/urban-circuit-qualification-deadlines/1109)  
  Virtual Team Qualification: January 3, 2020
2. [https://community.subtchallenge.com/t/tunnel-qualification-how-to-and-deadline/1107](https://community.subtchallenge.com/t/tunnel-qualification-how-to-and-deadline/1107)  
  Qualification for the Virtual Urban Circuit will require submitting a docker solution against the Urban Circuit Qualification scenario through the Tech Repo \([https://subtchallenge.world/compete](https://subtchallenge.world/compete)\). In order to qualify, a team will need to submit a docker solution that is able to successfully report at least five of the artifacts within one hour of simulation time. Teams may submit against the Urban Qualification scenario as many times as they choose until the deadline for the Virtual Urban Circuit qualification, January 3, 2020 AoE.
3. [https://youtu.be/aJ9co84-aaQ](https://youtu.be/aJ9co84-aaQ) preview  

‌
content.html:
Yes there are updates:

  1. https://community.subtchallenge.com/t/urban-circuit-qualification-deadlines/1109
    Virtual Team Qualification: January 3, 2020
  2. https://community.subtchallenge.com/t/tunnel-qualification-how-to-and-deadline/1107
    Qualification for the Virtual Urban Circuit will require submitting a docker solution against the Urban Circuit Qualification scenario through the Tech Repo (https://subtchallenge.world/compete). In order to qualify, a team will need to submit a docker solution that is able to successfully report at least five of the artifacts within one hour of simulation time. Teams may submit against the Urban Qualification scenario as many times as they choose until the deadline for the Virtual Urban Circuit qualification, January 3, 2020 AoE.
  3. https://youtu.be/aJ9co84-aaQ preview
